maxwell

Class AuctionItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • maxwell.AuctionItem

  • public class AuctionItem
extends java.lang.Object
    AuctionItem stores information about an auction item, including a list of the history of bids and whether the item is currently in bidding or not.
    Author:
    Steven Vuong

    • Constructor Detail

      • AuctionItem

        public AuctionItem(java.lang.String uniqueName,
                   double rsPrice,
                   java.lang.String ownerID)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        uniqueName - A unique name to identify the item being auctioned
        rsPrice - The reserved price of the item
        ownerID - The id of the owner
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the price is negative

    • Method Detail

      • getOwner

        public java.lang.String getOwner()
        Get the name of the owner
        Returns:
        Returns the id of the owner

      • setReservedPrice

        public boolean setReservedPrice(double newReservedPrice)
        Change the reserved price. Returns false if setting was unsuccessful.
        Parameters:
        newReservedPrice - The new reserved price
        Returns:
        Returns true if the change was successful. Otherwise false.

      • startAuction

        public boolean startAuction()
        Start the auction on the item. Returns false if item has already been auctioned or is already being auctioned.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the auction was started by the function. Otherwise false.

      • stopAuction

        public boolean stopAuction()
        Stop the auction on the item. Returns false if item is not being auctioned.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the auction was stopped by the function. Otherwise false.

      • isActive

        public boolean isActive()
        Check if the item is being auctioned.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the item is currently up for auction.

      • isFinished

        public boolean isFinished()
        Check if the item has been auctioned.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the item has finished auction.

      • getItemName

        public java.lang.String getItemName()
        Returns:
        Returns the name of the item.

      • getReservedPrice

        public double getReservedPrice()
        Returns:
        Returns the reserved price of the item.

      • addBid

        public boolean addBid(Bid newBid)
        Adds a new bid for the item.
        Parameters:
        newBid - a new Bid item to be added.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the new bid was added successfully.

      • getLastBid

        public Bid getLastBid()
        Returns the last bid if it exists. Otherwise returns null (default value).
        Returns:
        The Bid item of the last bid.

      • getLastBidAmount

        public double getLastBidAmount()
        Returns the last successful bid amount.
        Returns:
        The amount of the last bid

      • isSuccessful

        public boolean isSuccessful()
        Returns:
        Returns true if the auction reserve price was met and the auction finished. Otherwise false.
